channel.title: War Google on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Google on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: nice weather
item.description: The past couple days have been brilliant. yesterday I went and walked around the clark/belmont area with a friend and I didn’t wear a coat. so nice. what a pleasent surprise. I love nice weather. today I spent lunch outside and for the first time is awhile was worried about sunburn. heh. stupid skin. So if you have a sony wega tv and wanna muck with the internals - try this.
